definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if

sentences.english: His audience consists predominantly of groups of rugby-club revellers.
sentences.chinese: 他的观众主要是橄榄球俱乐部里那些纵酒作乐的人。

sentences.english: Those who abuse alcohol are also likely to develop illegal systems to obtain it.
sentences.chinese: 那些纵酒的人还可能想出各种非法的方式来获得它。

sentences.english: He can't throw off his drinking habit.
sentences.chinese: 他摆脱不了纵酒的习惯。

sentences.english: He spends every night boozing with his friends.
sentences.chinese: 他每晚都消磨于和朋友们的纵酒中。

definition: drinking party/to go on a binge/to paint the town red
to do sth to one's heart's content
lit. singing of the wind and the moon; fig. vacuous and sentimental (of poetry or art)
to indulge in something to one's heart's content/wanton or willful
to sing loudly/to lift one's voice in song
to go courting/to visit a brothel (old)/related to 野遊|野游[ye3 you2]
